issue.title: [Rust] Reuse array builder after calling finish()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4075](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4075). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently a buffer/array builder is consumed after `finish()` is called. This may not be very convenient as one may want to use the same builder for multiple arrays. This changes the behavior of it to reset the builder instead.
